parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The image ID of the AIC instance.

parameters.name: ImageType
parameters.description:
The type of the image. Valid values:

*   **public**: public image
*   **private**: custom image

parameters.name: ImageUrl
parameters.description: The URL of the AIC image repository.

parameters.name: MaxDate
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the 2006-01-02 format. By default, the time range to query is not restricted.

parameters.name: MinDate
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the 2006-01-02 format. By default, the time range to query is not restricted.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The maximum value is **100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the image. Valid values:

*   **verifying**
*   **disable**
*   **available**
